## Bio

My name is Travis Rutledge, and I am a data analytics professional with 10 years of experience in turning data into actionable insights. I am proficient in data transformation, visualisation, dashboard development, Tableau, SQL, R, and Alteryx. I've previously worked for [Amazon - Whole Foods Market](https://www.wholefoodsmarket.com/), [Goodwill Industries International](https://www.goodwill.org/), and [International Justice Mission](https://www.ijm.org/). In my spare time, I enjoy doing pro-bono work for various nonprofits, cooking, playing tennis, and playing games with friends. I'm currently a graduate student in the [Master in Business Analytics course](https://handbook.monash.edu/current/courses/B6022) at Monash University in Melbourne, Australia.
